title: I need help
body: Just updated to the new client. It was fine when I downloaded but the second time I open it I can't see any content. I can't see runes or the skin shards in my loot or the champion names

replies.body:
As *SteveTheMiner* mentioned, opening up the Client option (cog, top-right) and running a repair may be the best option at the moment, as this could be caused by missing files in the League directory.

If this persists through the repair, please [**grab a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) so I can take a look.
Try to use the **Repair** function in the client.
